scripts.patch: npm run git:patch && npm run github:push
scripts.git:patch: git add . && git commit -m 'publish patch' && npm run patch:publish
scripts.minor: npm run git:minor && npm run github:push
scripts.git:minor: git add . && git commit -m 'publish minor' && npm run minor:publish
scripts.major: npm run git:major && npm run github:push
scripts.git:major: git add . && git commit -m 'publish major' && npm run major:publish
